he Protective Armor of Darkness, which was also called elahranak in Alzhedo, was a religious event observed by worshipers of Ibrandul, the Lord of the Dry Depths.
Priests of Ibrandul participated in this secret ritual upon reaching a certain rank within the Church of Ibrandul. The priest would drink the blood of an ibrandlin while the high priest of one of Ibranduls churches, called an Impenetrable Lurker, performed a magical ceremony. The magic of the ritual caused much of the priests arms, chest, back, and legs to become covered in hardened overlapping scales, offering a great deal of protection at the cost of making them a terrifying sight to behold.
